verses.verse: I am sought <WH1875> <WH8738> of them that asked <WH7592> <WH8804> not <WH3808> for me; I am found <WH4672> <WH8738> of them that sought <WH1245> <WH8765> me not <WH3808>: I said <WH559> <WH8804>, Behold me, behold me, unto a nation <WH1471> that was not called <WH7121> <WH8795> by my name <WH8034>.

I have spread out <WH6566> <WH8765> my hands <WH3027> all the day <WH3117> unto a rebellious <WH5637> <WH8802> people <WH5971>, which walketh <WH1980> <WH8802> in a way <WH1870> that was not good <WH2896>, after <WH310> their own thoughts <WH4284>;

A people <WH5971> that provoketh me to anger <WH3707> <WH8688> continually <WH8548> to my face <WH6440>; that sacrificeth <WH2076> <WH8802> in gardens <WH1593>, and burneth incense <WH6999> <WH8764> upon altars of brick <WH3843>;

Which remain <WH3427> <WH8802> among the graves <WH6913>, and lodge <WH3885> <WH8799> in the monuments <WH5341> <WH8803>, which eat <WH398> <WH8802> swine's <WH2386> flesh <WH1320>, and broth <WH4839> <WH8675> <WH6564> of abominable <WH6292> things is in their vessels <WH3627>;

Which say <WH559> <WH8802>, Stand <WH7126> <WH8798> by thyself, come not near <WH5066> <WH8799> to me; for I am holier <WH6942> <WH8804> than thou. These are a smoke <WH6227> in my nose <WH639>, a fire <WH784> that burneth <WH3344> <WH8802> all the day <WH3117>.

Behold, it is written <WH3789> <WH8803> before <WH6440> me: I will not keep silence <WH2814> <WH8799>, but will recompense <WH7999> <WH8765>, even recompense <WH7999> <WH8765> into their bosom <WH2436>,

Your iniquities <WH5771>, and the iniquities <WH5771> of your fathers <WH1> together <WH3162>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, which have burned incense <WH6999> <WH8765> upon the mountains <WH2022>, and blasphemed <WH2778> <WH8765> me upon the hills <WH1389>: therefore will I measure <WH4058> <WH8804> their former <WH7223> work <WH6468> into their bosom <WH2436>.

Thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>, As the new wine <WH8492> is found <WH4672> <WH8735> in the cluster <WH811>, and one saith <WH559> <WH8804>, Destroy <WH7843> <WH8686> it not; for a b'rakhah <WH1293> is in it: so will I do <WH6213> <WH8799> for my servants <WH5650> ' sakes, that I may not destroy <WH7843> <WH8687> them all.

And I will bring forth <WH3318> <WH8689> a seed <WH2233> out of Ya`akov <WH3290>, and out of Y'hudah <WH3063> an inheritor <WH3423> <WH8802> of my mountains <WH2022>: and mine elect <WH972> shall inherit <WH3423> <WH8804> it, and my servants <WH5650> shall dwell <WH7931> <WH8799> there.

And Sharon <WH8289> shall be a fold <WH5116> of flocks <WH6629>, and the valley <WH6010> of Achor <WH5911> a place for the herds <WH1241> to lie down in <WH7258>, for my people <WH5971> that have sought <WH1875> <WH8804> me.

But ye are they that forsake <WH5800> <WH8802> the YY <WH3068>, that forget <WH7913> my holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>, that prepare <WH6186> <WH8802> a table <WH7979> for that troop <WH1409> <WH8677> <WH1408>, and that furnish <WH4390> <WH8764> the drink offering <WH4469> unto that number <WH4507>.

Therefore will I number <WH4487> <WH8804> you to the sword <WH2719>, and ye shall all bow down <WH3766> <WH8799> to the slaughter <WH2874>: because when I called <WH7121> <WH8804>, ye did not answer <WH6030> <WH8804>; when I spake <WH1696> <WH8765>, ye did not hear <WH8085> <WH8804>; but did <WH6213> <WH8799> evil <WH7451> before mine eyes <WH5869>, and did choose <WH977> <WH8804> that wherein I delighted <WH2654> <WH8804> not.

Therefore thus saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069>, Behold, my servants <WH5650> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799>, but ye shall be hungry <WH7456> <WH8799>: behold, my servants <WH5650> shall drink <WH8354> <WH8799>, but ye shall be thirsty <WH6770> <WH8799>: behold, my servants <WH5650> shall rejoice <WH8055> <WH8799>, but ye shall be ashamed <WH954> <WH8799>:

Behold, my servants <WH5650> shall sing <WH7442> <WH8799> for joy <WH2898> of heart <WH3820>, but ye shall cry <WH6817> <WH8799> for sorrow <WH3511> of heart <WH3820>, and shall howl <WH3213> <WH8686> for vexation <WH7667> of spirit <WH7307>.

And ye shall leave <WH3240> <WH8689> your name <WH8034> for a curse <WH7621> unto my chosen <WH972>: for the YY <WH136> GOD <WH3069> shall slay <WH4191> <WH8689> thee, and call <WH7121> <WH8799> his servants <WH5650> by another <WH312> name <WH8034>:

That he who blesseht <WH1288> <WH8693> himself in the earth <WH776> shall bless <WH1288> <WH8691> himself in the 'Elohim <WH430> of truth <WH543>; and he that sweareth <WH7650> <WH8737> in the earth <WH776> shall swear <WH7650> <WH8735> by the 'Elohim <WH430> of truth <WH543>; because the former <WH7223> troubles <WH6869> are forgotten <WH7911> <WH8738>, and because they are hid <WH5641> <WH8738> from mine eyes <WH5869>.

For, behold, I create <WH1254> <WH8802> new <WH2319> heavens <WH8064> and a new <WH2319> earth <WH776>: and the former <WH7223> shall not be remembered <WH2142> <WH8735>, nor come <WH5927> <WH8799> into mind <WH3820>.

But be ye glad <WH7797> <WH8798> and rejoice <WH1523> <WH8798> for ever <WH5703> in that which I create <WH1254> <WH8802>: for, behold, I create <WH1254> <WH8802> Yerushalayim <WH3389> a rejoicing <WH1525>, and her people <WH5971> a joy <WH4885>.

And I will rejoice <WH1523> <WH8804> in Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and joy <WH7797> <WH8804> in my people <WH5971>: and the voice <WH6963> of weeping <WH1065> shall be no more heard <WH8085> <WH8735> in her, nor the voice <WH6963> of crying <WH2201>.

There shall be no more thence an infant <WH5764> of days <WH3117>, nor an old man <WH2205> that hath not filled <WH4390> <WH8762> his days <WH3117>: for the child <WH5288> shall die <WH4191> <WH8799> an hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121>; but the sinner <WH2398> <WH8802> being an hundred <WH3967> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> shall be accursed <WH7043> <WH8792>.

And they shall build <WH1129> <WH8804> houses <WH1004>, and inhabit <WH3427> <WH8804> them; and they shall plant <WH5193> <WH8804> vineyards <WH3754>, and eat <WH398> <WH8804> the fruit <WH6529> of them.

They shall not build <WH1129> <WH8799>, and another <WH312> inhabit <WH3427> <WH8799>; they shall not plant <WH5193> <WH8799>, and another <WH312> eat <WH398> <WH8799>: for as the days <WH3117> of a tree <WH6086> are the days <WH3117> of my people <WH5971>, and mine elect <WH972> shall long enjoy <WH1086> <WH8762> the work <WH4639> of their hands <WH3027>.

They shall not labour <WH3021> <WH8799> in vain <WH7385>, nor bring forth <WH3205> <WH8799> for trouble <WH928>; for they are the seed <WH2233> of the blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> of the YY <WH3068>, and their offspring <WH6631> with them.
And it shall come to pass, that before they call <WH7121> <WH8799>, I will answer <WH6030> <WH8799>; and while they are yet speaking <WH1696> <WH8764>, I will hear <WH8085> <WH8799>.

The wolf <WH2061> and the lamb <WH2924> shall feed <WH7462> <WH8799> together <WH259>, and the lion <WH738> shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> straw <WH8401> like the bullock <WH1241>: and dust <WH6083> shall be the serpent's <WH5175> meat <WH3899>. They shall not hurt <WH7489> <WH8686> nor destroy <WH7843> <WH8686> in all my holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022>, saith <WH559> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068>.
